TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SspiSecurityTokenProvider extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider

remarks.para: The SSPI security token is not capable of any cryptographic operations, but contains only the settings needed for Windows authentication.

summary.para: Represents a security token provider that provides an SSPI security token.
